# SplitCS - C# Class Splitter

This is a C# .NET 9 console application that reads a .cs file containing a single class and splits it into multiple partial class files based on user input.

## Project Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Get project setup info
- [ ] Scaffold the project
- [ ] Implement core functionality  
- [ ] Compile and test project
- [ ] Create documentation

## Features
- Split C# class files into multiple partial class files
- Support for even distribution across specified number of files
- Support for public/private method separation
- Preserve namespace and class structure
- Maintain proper indentation and formatting
